publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3912 Dr Richard Simpson: Congratulations to Scottish School of Primary Care—That the Parliament congratulates Professor Frank Sullivan and colleagues from the Scottish School of Primary Care, Scotland’s collaborative primary care research vehicle, for being awarded the British Medical Journal’s research paper of the year for a paper on the treatment of Bell’s palsy, published in the New England Journal of Medicine, and notes that the research will benefit all those who contract this potentially disfiguring condition across the world.
S3M-3912 Congratulations to Scottish School of Primary Care (lodged on 15 April 2009) Mary Scanlon*
S3M-3912 Congratulations to Scottish School of Primary Care (lodged on 15 April 2009) Rhoda Grant*
